title: "Advent of Code"
subtitle: "Rhian's solutions and notes."

[Advent of Code](https://adventofcode.com) is a series of increasingly difficult programming challenges, released daily each year throughout December in the run-up to Christmas.

This website is created from the 
[EllaKaye/advent-of-code](https://github.com/EllaKaye/advent-of-code) repository. 
It is built with [Quarto](https://quarto.org) and supported by the [**aochelpers**](https://ellakaye.github.io/aochelpers) package.
